name: ai-my-personal-notes-api
description: ``` https://localhost:62926/graphql/ ``` ## sample query ``` # mutation mutation addAuthor {   addAuthor(input: {name: "Schiller"}) {     record {       id       name     }   } }

scripts.deploy: serverless config credentials --provider aws --key ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }} --secret ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }} && serverless deploy --stage dev
